update pm_tm_vehicle_dispatch
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_CODE = #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_NO = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PLACE = #{sPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
D_PLACE = #{dPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_MILEAGE = #{sMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
D_MILEAGE = #{dMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RIDOR = #{ridor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PTJ_DRIVER = #{ptjDriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_CODE = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_DESC = #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pm_tm_vehicle_dispatch set COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_CODE = #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_NO = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PLACE = #{sPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, D_PLACE = #{dPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_MILEAGE = #{sMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, D_MILEAGE = #{dMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RIDOR = #{ridor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PTJ_DRIVER = #{ptjDriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_CODE = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_DESC = #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from pm_tm_vehicle_dispatch where task_status=1 and PTJ_DRIVER=#{ptjDriver} order by rowid desc
mapper.update: update pm_tm_vehicle_dispatch set S_DATE=#{sDate}, S_PLACE_X=#{splaceX}, S_PLACE_Y=#{splaceY}, E_DATE=#{eDate}, D_PLACE_X=#{dplaceX}, D_PLACE_Y=#{dplaceY}, S_MILEAGE_IMG=#{smileageImg}, D_MILEAGE_IMG=#{dmileageImg}, TASK_STATUS=2, TRACK_XS=#{trackXs}, TRACK_YS=#{trackYs}, S_MILEAGE=#{sMileage}, D_MILEAGE=#{dMileage}, REMARKS=#{remarks} WHERE rowid=#{rowid}
